data.title: New Music: Candiace and Drew Sidora – Affirmations Pt. II
data.meta_description: "Real Housewives" stars Candiace Dillard and Drew Sidora collaborated on a remix of the song "Affirmations"
data.meta_site_name: Sandra Rose | Latest Celebrity News, Sports & Entertainment
data.text:
“Real Housewives” stars Candiace Dillard and Drew Sidora collaborated on a remix of the song “Affirmations” from Candiace’s debut album Deep Space.

“Affirmations Pt. II” debuted on the latest episode of the Bravo series Real Housewives of Atlanta. Candiace is a cast member on Real Housewives of Potomac.

The song has now been released officially — and fans can’t get enough of the track’s message of self love.

The ladies sing on the chorus:

Forget about what they say

I’m gonna be right here

I’m gonna love me all the way

No matter what they may say

I’m gonna be right here

I’m gonna love me all the way

The Real Housewives of Atlanta is currently in its 15th season. Drew teams up with Kandi Burruss, Kenya Moore, Marlo Hampton, Sheree Whitfield, Monyetta Shaw and Sanya Richards-Ross to bring the drama.

Candiace and Drew Sidora – Affirmations Pt. II

SR rated: 3/5 roses
